body:
I suppose it is corner since the most natural way (at least in Python API) of getting an element from 1D tensor is through **strided_slice**.

Unfortunately getting **strided_slice** ready is more difficult than patching **gather**. In fact I also wrote a *toco* transformation to convert this kind of **strided_slice** into 0D **gather**.

Unfortunately getting strided_slice ready is more difficult than patching gather. In fact I also wrote a toco transformation to convert this kind of strided_slice into 0D gather.
body_text:
I suppose it is corner since the most natural way (at least in Python API) of getting an element from 1D tensor is through strided_slice.
Unfortunately getting strided_slice ready is more difficult than patching gather. In fact I also wrote a toco transformation to convert this kind of strided_slice into 0D gather.
